Assignment Logic Explanation:
  • Past Expertise - Developer has completed similar tasks in the past 3 months
  • Recently Completed - Developer has recently completed all assigned tasks
  • Lowest Workload - Developer has the fewest assigned tasks
  • Default Assignment - Task assigned to available developer when no other criteria met
